metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16477 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A bypass vulnerability in Active Storage >= 5.2.0 for Google Cloud Storage and Disk services allow an attacker to modify the `content-disposition` and `content-type` parameters which can be used in with HTML files and have them executed inline. Additionally, if combined with other techniques such as cookie bombing and specially crafted AppCache manifests, an attacker can gain access to private signed URLs within a specific storage path. This vulnerability has been fixed in version 5.2.1.1.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
